title: Introducing Myself
content: My name is Keegan and I'm from Canada. I've been an artist, musician, writer and cook, but now I'm starting my coding journey since I love making games and this will be where I keep projects and related information. I may sometimes include projects from other parts of my life. Thanks for stopping by.

title: Second Dev Log - 21 May 2025
content: KroFly Magic Compass app is now in closed testing, if you'd like to participate please send an email to cautiousdollop@protonmail.com

title: First Dev Log â€“ 21 May 2025
content: Current Projects are the KroFly App, a game called Bubble&Squeak, and a few other things slowly being worked on, but not worth mentioning yet. I will slowly update the status and addition of projects through these dev logs for the time being.
